descriptionText: Thank you for your interest in volunteering for COVID-19 research. If you’re a U.S. Veteran, please answer the questions below and we’ll add you to our VA volunteer registry. If we think you may meet the criteria for a research study, we’ll contact you for a phone interview.  Note: We won’t share your information with anyone outside of VA. If you're not a  Veteran, you can volunteer through the  COVID-19 Prevention Network.
